data.title: Petrochemicals complex profile: Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Complex, India
data.meta_description: Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Complex is an upcoming petrochemical complex located in Madhya Pradesh India.
data.text:
Details of the key upcoming projects in Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Complex

The complex is set to add capacity with some of the key upcoming plants including Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Benzene Plant, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Ethylene Plant, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Polyethylene Plant, Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Polyethylene Plant (Swing), and Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Polypropylene Plant.

The operator details for some of the key upcoming plants are as follows:

Key products capacity - Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Complex, 2022-2030

The complex is expected to produce key products such as ethylene, polyethylene, polypropylene, benzene, toluene etc.

Ethylene accounts for the majority of the total annual capacity of the complex, followed by polyethylene and polypropylene respectively.

About Bharat Petroleum

Bharat Petroleum Corp Ltd (BPCL) is an integrated oil and gas company. It carries out production of oil and natural gas, refining of crude oil and marketing and distribution of petroleum products. The company also focuses on renewable energy. It produces oil products, including light distillates, middle distillates and others. BPCL markets products through a network of retail outlets, dealers, and distributors. Its major brands include Mak, Speed, and Bharat Gas. The company also provides fuel to domestic and international airlines. It has refineries in Maharashtra, Kerala, Assam and Madhya Pradesh in India. BPCL is headquartered in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.

For more details on the Bharat Petroleum Corporation Bina Complex, buy the profile here.

This content was updated on 14 May 2024
